attributes.action: Scrap the Royal Yacht and use the cash to install ventilation in all schools.
attributes.background: Ventilation for every classroom would cost half as much as the royal yacht, which even the royal family do not want built. Protect children’s education, health and lives!  Do what should have been done over  a year ago and prioritise children before vanity.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Funding for ventilation in all school/college/uni classrooms
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595205
